items.title: Study schema definition
items.description: Complete description of the study schema.

System name.description: Internal system name. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchling/PostgreSQL compatible name.

Description.description: Documentation for the study schema. This is not saved to Benchling.

Prefix.description: The ID prefix for a study schema.

Type.$comment: TODO: I'm not sure that this is the right enum list for study name templates

Definition.description: Depending on Type will be text, a field name, or may be omitted if N/A.

Name template.$comment: TODO: Need to define this better. How handle pre-defiend values like separator, lot, etc.

Entry templates.description: List entry templates that are applicable to the study schema. Maybe empty.

Approval required.description: Require approval of Design before proceeding to Execution.

Study type.description: Must match one of the Benchling-defined types.

Diagram.description: Properties solely used for diagram rendering.

Description.description: Documentation for the field. This is not saved to Benchling.

Tool tip.description: Field tool tip appears on hover on column headings. Not currently supported by Benchling.

System name.description: Internal system name for the field. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchling/PostgreSQL compatible name.

Multi-select.description: Field is a multi-select field when true.

Definition.description: Name of target object if Type is a one of the link types.

Computed field.description: Describes the computed field. Only present for computed fields.

API ID.description: API ID for the study schema created during an export operation. This is ignored for import operations.
